00015 void uiScore::displayUIScore(const GLuint & tempImage, int score)
00016 {
00017         //finding centre of screen
00018         int wc = width / 2; 
00019         int hc = height / 2;
00020         int d = 300; // half of width and height of UI screen
00021 
00022         glPushMatrix();
00023         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00024         glPushMatrix();
00025         glLoadIdentity();
00026         gluOrtho2D(0, width, 0, height);
00027         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00028         glLoadIdentity();
00029         
00030         //gl depth test disabled so hud draws correctly
00031         glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00032         glDisable(GL_LIGHTING); 
00033         glClear(GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00034         glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D); //need for tempImage
00035 
00036         // display menu image at screen centre
00037         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tempImage); 
00038         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00039                 glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0);
00040                 glVertex2f(wc - d, hc + d);
00041                 glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0);
00042                 glVertex2f(wc - d, hc - d);
00043                 glTexCoord2f(1.0, 1.0);
00044                 glVertex2f(wc + d, hc - d);
00045                 glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0);
00046                 glVertex2f(wc + d, hc + d);
00047         glEnd();
00048 
00049         //convert int value to letter
00050         if (arr[0] == NULL) { // if arr is null otherwise leave as is
00051                 arr[0] = 1;
00052                 arr[1] = 1;
00053                 arr[2] = 1;
00054         }
00055         string sinitial1 = alphaFromInt(arr[0]);
00056         string sinitial2 = alphaFromInt(arr[1]);
00057         string sinitial3 = alphaFromInt(arr[2]);
00058         string sscore = to_string(score);
00059 
00060 
00061         //data will need to be converted to string in order to put on screen
00062         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0); //sets active to none
00063         glColor3f(0.498f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
00064         glRasterPos2i(wc - 50, hc + 50);
00065         glutBitmapString(GLUT_BITMAP_9_BY_15, (const unsigned char*)sscore.c_str());
00066         glRasterPos2i(wc - 60, hc -115);
00067         glutBitmapString(GLUT_BITMAP_9_BY_15, (const unsigned char*)sinitial1.c_str());
00068         glRasterPos2i(wc -5, hc - 115);
00069         glutBitmapString(GLUT_BITMAP_9_BY_15, (const unsigned char*)sinitial2.c_str());
00070         glRasterPos2i(wc +45, hc - 115);
00071         glutBitmapString(GLUT_BITMAP_9_BY_15, (const unsigned char*)sinitial3.c_str());
00072 
00073         glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00074         glEnable(GL_LIGHTING);
00075 
00076         // Reset Perspective Projection
00077         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00078         glPopMatrix();
00079         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00080         glPopMatrix();
00081 }

00083 void uiScore::mouseUIScore(int button, int state, int x, int y)
00084 {
00085         //KM 15/10/2016 click noise - sourced from http://soundbible.com/1705-Click2.html
00086         CEasySound *es;
00087         CSound* clickSound;
00088         es = CEasySound::Instance();
00089         clickSound = es->GetSound(es->Load("sounds/Click2-Sebastian-759472264.wav"));
00090 
00091         //variables for boundaries
00092         int hc = height / 2;
00093         int wc = width / 2;
00094         int maxLetter = 26;
00095         int minLetter = 1;
00096 
00097         //when click in pixel area of menu option make click sound and do expected action
00098         if (button == GLUT_LEFT_BUTTON && state == GLUT_UP)
00099         {
00100                 //will need to height-y to convert coords to match screen and mouse together
00101 
00102                 //std::cout << "height " << height << ", x " << x << ", y " << y << std::endl;
00103                 /* Trouble shooting couts
00104                 cout << "intitials ";
00105                 for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00106                         cout << arr[i] << " ";
00107                 }
00108                 cout << endl;*/
00109                 //if coord range equals 
00110                 //scroll up wards in alpha for intial 1
00111                 if (x >= wc-72 && x <= wc-42 && y >= hc+70 && y <= hc+92)
00112                 {
00113                         clickSound->Play();
00114                         if (arr[0] >= minLetter && arr[0] < maxLetter) {
00115                                 arr[0]++;
00116                         }
00117                 }
00118                 //scroll down wards in alpha for intial 1
00119                 if (x >= wc - 72 && x <= wc-42 && y >= hc+124 && y <= hc+149)
00120                 {
00121                         clickSound->Play();
00122                         if (arr[0] > minLetter && arr[0] <= maxLetter) {
00123                                 arr[0]--;
00124                         }
00125                 }
00126                 //scroll up wards in alpha for intial 2
00127                 if (x >= wc - 18 && x <= wc + 14 && y >= hc + 70 && y <= hc + 92)
00128                 {
00129                         clickSound->Play();
00130                         if (arr[1] >= minLetter && arr[1] < maxLetter) {
00131                                 arr[1]++;
00132                         }
00133                 }
00134                 //scroll down wards in alpha for intial 2
00135                 if (x >= wc - 18 && x <= wc +14 && y >= hc + 124 && y <= hc + 149)
00136                 {
00137                         clickSound->Play();
00138                         if (arr[1] > minLetter && arr[1] <= maxLetter) {
00139                                 arr[1]--;
00140                         }
00141                 }
00142                 //scroll up wards in alpha for intial 3
00143                 if (x >= wc +34 && x <= wc +69 && y >= hc + 70 && y <= hc + 92)
00144                 {
00145                         clickSound->Play();
00146                         if (arr[2] >= minLetter && arr[2] < maxLetter) {
00147                                 arr[2]++;
00148                         }
00149                 }
00150                 //scroll down wards in alpha for intial 3
00151                 if (x >= wc +34 && x <= wc +69 && y >= hc + 124 && y <= hc + 149)
00152                 {
00153                         clickSound->Play();
00154                         if (arr[2] > minLetter && arr[2] <= maxLetter) {
00155                                 arr[2]--;
00156                         }
00157                 }
00158                 //return to game
00159                 if (x >= wc-54 && x <= wc+54 && y >= hc+236 && y <= hc+271)
00160                 {
00161                         clickSound->Play();
00162                         setInitials(arr);
00163                         gVar.uiScore = false;
00164                         gVar.paused = false;
00165                 }
00166         }
00167 }

00169 void uiScore::setInitials(int arr[] )
00170 {
00171         string temp;
00172         string temp2;
00173 
00174         //cout << "moving array to string " << temp << endl;
00175 
00176         for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00177                 temp2 = alphaFromInt(arr[i]);
00178                 temp.append(temp2);
00179                 //cout << "moving array to string " << temp << endl;
00180         }
00181 
00182         initials = temp;
00183 }

00190 string uiScore::alphaFromInt(int letter) {
00191         switch (letter) {
00192         case 1: return "A";
00193                 break; 
00194         case 2: return "B";
00195                 break;
00196         case 3: return "C";
00197                 break;
00198         case 4: return "D";
00199                 break;
00200         case 5: return "E";
00201                 break;
00202         case 6: return "F";
00203                 break;
00204         case 7: return "G";
00205                 break;
00206         case 8: return "H";
00207                 break;
00208         case 9: return "I";
00209                 break;
00210         case 10: return "J";
00211                 break;
00212         case 11: return "K";
00213                 break; 
00214         case 12: return "L";
00215                 break; 
00216         case 13: return "M";
00217                 break; 
00218         case 14: return "N";
00219                 break; 
00220         case 15: return "O";
00221                 break; 
00222         case 16: return "P";
00223                 break; 
00224         case 17: return "Q";
00225                 break; 
00226         case 18: return "R";
00227                 break; 
00228         case 19: return "S";
00229                 break; 
00230         case 20: return "T";
00231                 break; 
00232         case 21: return "U";
00233                 break; 
00234         case 22: return "V";
00235                 break; 
00236         case 23: return "W";
00237                 break;
00238         case 24: return "X";
00239                 break; 
00240         case 25: return "Y";
00241                 break; 
00242         case 26: return "Z";
00243                 break; 
00244         default: return "-";
00245         }
00246 }
